DOC.brief_summary: The study propose workshop-based educational experience utilizes standardized preceptor training session , standard skill assessment checklist , videotape feedback improve student comfort confidence perform pediatric physical examination provide information improve curriculum offering .
DOC.brief_title: Standardizing Educational Opportunities Complete Pediatric Physical Exam
DOC.detailed_description: The baseline clinical experience third year medical student rotate clerkship varies , depend previous clerkship volunteer opportunity previously encounter . The less experienced third year medical student may require time feedback develop competency . The availability experience clinical preceptor background patient may also play role development pediatric physical examination skill . Other institution offer standardized approach teach health maintenance physical exam . To address issue , propose workshop-based educational experience ( 1 ) determine whether offer workshop standardize exposure physical exam junior medical student improve opportunity practice physical exam skill non-threatening environment , ( 2 ) promote immediate feedback student allow self-reflection view videotape performance , ( 3 ) delineate physical exam skill change junior medical student throughout year , ( 4 ) evaluate inter-rater variability preceptor teach health maintenance exams student rotate pediatric clerkship .
DOC.criteria: third year medical student participate physical exam skill workshop requirement pediatric clerkship ; data obtain review videotape student consent data use include data student consent use data use analysis
